page.title: 16 TEE UP_OR ON YOUR BIKE!
page.content: {Dalmilling Golf Course}has been a most successful venture in the growth of the community,providing its members _now numbering 167_with year round relaxation and the friendly spirit of competition. For the people who play at this course,there are also the advantages of receiving expert tuition and help from a professional golfer and of enjoying the congenial,social atmosphere in the "nineteenth hole" of the clubhouse,constructed in 1982. For the younger people,especially the boys,a special track for{B.M.X.bikers has been constructed in a bid to make sure that those who enjoy this current craze,may do so in relative safety,not only for themselves,but also for other members of the community_motorists in particular{.The track was designed by {Sandy Lewis,a Primary 7 pupil from {Dalmilling School in 1984.
